summary: "Night of the Living Dead" is a 1968 horror movie by George A. Romero about seven people trapped in a Pennsylvania farmhouse, attacked by zombies. The film, made on a $100,000 budget, became a huge hit, earning over 250 times its cost. It introduced the modern zombie to popular culture and was controversial for its graphic violence. Despite mixed reviews, it gained a cult following and is now considered a classic, influencing many horror films and media. The movie spawned a franchise with five sequels and a 1990 remake.
title: Night of the Living Dead
